titleStmt.title: A precious and most divine letter from that famous and ever to be renowned Earl of Essex, (father to the now Lord Generall his excellence) to the Earl of South-Hampton, in the latter time of Queen Elizabeths reigne. Printed according to order.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1566-1601.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
